com.gh.bmd.jrt.routine

Class AbstractRoutine<INPUT,OUTPUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gh.bmd.jrt.routine.TemplateRoutine<INPUT,OUTPUT>
      • com.gh.bmd.jrt.routine.AbstractRoutine<INPUT,OUTPUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    INPUT - the input data type.
    OUTPUT - the output data type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Routine<INPUT,OUTPUT>

    public abstract class AbstractRoutine<INPUT,OUTPUT>
extends TemplateRoutine<INPUT,OUTPUT>
    Basic abstract implementation of a routine.

    This class provides implementations for all the routine functionalities. The inheriting class just need to creates invocation objects when required.

    Created by davide on 9/7/14.

      • purge

        public void purge()
        Description copied from interface: Routine
        Makes the routine destroy all the cached invocation instances.

        This method is useful to force the release of external resources when done with the routine. Note however that the routine will still be usable after the method returns.

        Normally it is not needed to call this method.
